entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
